description: Fires when a playback session is interrupted (not including pauses).

adEnabled.description: false if the user has adblock or any other ad blockers, true otherwise if they can view your video ads.

contentAssetId.description: The Content Asset ID of the video that was interrupted in the video player.

contentPodId.description: The Content Pod ID of the video that was interrupted in the video player.

fullScreen.description: true if playback is currently in full screen mode and false otherwise.

highlight.description: Whether or not the video content about to be played is a Cam Highlight.

method.description: Denotes how the playback was interrupted (ie. 'Closed App' or 'Skipped').

playerSessionId.description: The unique ID of the overall session used to tie all events generated from a specific playback. This value should be same across all playback, content, and ad events if they are from the same playback session.

position.description: The current index position in seconds of the playhead, excluding the duration of any ads seen (if available).

quality.description: The quality of the video, ie. ‘highres’, ‘hd1080’, ‘480p’.

rewind.description: Whether or not the video content about to be played is a Cam Rewind.

sound.description: The sound level of the playback represented in a 0 to 100 scale where 0 is muted and 100 is full volume.

subregionName.description: Name of the sub-region where camera is located.

surflineSession.description: Whether or not the video content about to be played is a Surfline Session.

totalLength.description: The total duration of the playback in seconds. This should include the duration of all your content and ad included in this playback session. For livestream playback, send null.

videoPlayer.description: The name of the video player (for example Spot Report).
